case.name: Dice transformation 1
case.description: Vriska rolls her dice, and transforms in a flash of light. This is the first time she's done this this game.

case.name: Outfit change 1
case.description: After the light from the transformation fades, Vriska is dressed in a different outfit. Add a "said marker" for "costume=0" (Link), "costume=b" (blue/black dress), or "costume=c" (golden dress) to react to a specific outfit here.

case.name: Outfit change 9
case.description: Vriska rolls her dice, and transforms in a flash of light. After the light from the transformation fades, her arms are tied behind her back and a vibrating dildo is stuck inside her. Add a "saying marker" for "costume=0" (bondage) or "costume=b" (body writing) to react to a specific outfit here.

case.name: Struggling masturbation
case.description: Vriska tries to get free of her bondage to continue playing cards, but can't manage to do so. The dildo is still stuck and vibrating inside her. It's implied she could get free if she *really* wanted to, and the struggling is somewhat performative.

case.name: Genetic fluid
case.description: Vriska's orgasm results in a huge amount of blue fluid spurting out of her vagina.
